Calm.name: Calm Energy
Calm.description: 1 <c=4fe61e>CALM</c> <c=energy>ENERGY</c> for each quarter of your hull you have.

Revenge.name: Revenge Energy
Revenge.description: 1 <c=e61ec8>REVENGE</c> <c=energy>ENERGY</c> for each quarter of your hull you have missing. 4 instead if you have only 1 hull.
